text: Scott Jackson (born February 5, 1987) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey defenceman who played in one game for the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League (NHL). He was selected by the St. Louis Blues in the second round (37th overall) of the 2005 NHL Entry Draft. ==Playing career== Signed as a free agent on July 3, 2008 by the Tampa Bay Lightning, Jackson was called up to the "Bolts" from the American Hockey League's Norfolk Admirals on April 11, 2010.
